item.description:
Thought this movie looks like a lot of fantasy fun and one of my favorite actors is in it ..... nope not telling I'll let you guess. But before giving you the movie info just know that the current time given is just a guesstamate & will be updated later. Also, I will be wearing a meetup badge. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand. I will be there 30 minutes prior to show time & we can go on in 10 min prior to show time. No worries if you run late ----after the movie I will wait outside the movie theatre & anyone that wishes to go for a bite to eat can join.

Movie: Starts at 7:05pm. I will be there by there by 6:30pm and we will be going into the theatre at 6:55pm

Synopsis From Movie Webpage
“Ethan Wate, 17, has had the same recurring dream for months. A mysterious young girl is waiting for him on a Civil War battlefield. Ethan desperately wants to be with her, but there is an unknown danger—and each time a lightning bolt cracks like a gunshot, killing Ethan before he ever reaches the girl.

The danger of this strange dream world, however, is preferable to Ethan's waking existence in Gatlin, South Carolina, a small, conservative Southern town that hasn't caught up to the 21st century, where nothing ever changes and nothing ever happens. Trapped at home with a father who has completely withdrawn since the sudden death of Ethan's mother, Ethan yearns for a life he can only read about in books.

If you want more details you can go to:
http://movies.yahoo.com/movie/beautiful-creatures-2/production-details.html
item.name: Beautiful Creatures Sat 2/16/13 6:30pm
